<html><div style='background-color:'><DIV>
<P><FONT face="Courier New" size=2>The Portal quacked for a moment as a small ship broke the barrier... <BR>the piolet checked his charts and began making preps for <BR>landing... "It seems i've made it a bit to early wouldn't you say?<BR><BR>The small character beside him nodded and watched as the earth came <BR>closer into view. <BR><BR>"I wonder if the ark is still secure... No matter, we do what we do <BR>best, were here for a purpose CrossWase, We stick to the mission." As <BR>the ship entered the atmosphere the piolet hit the cloaker and the <BR>ships entry was hidden from view. "Time to get to work." As soon as <BR>the ship touched down in the forrest the main door burst open as <BR>Motorcycle and driver burst out and tore across the ground... A <BR>Decepticon Symbol emblayzed across the windshield... <BR><BR>The Driver was dressed from head to toe in black leather and his face <BR>was covered by a helmet, He whistled and the Bike laughed.<BR><BR>"Dangerouse driving like this?" He smiled inward to himself. "You <BR>still have alot to learn about me boys, our my name isn't..." He <BR>jumped a stump and landed in a field heading towards predicon <BR>territory... "SIDEWAYS."</FONT><FONT lang=0 style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff" color=#000000 FAMILY="SANSSERIF"><BR></FONT><FONT lang=0 style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff" face=Arial color=#000000 FAMILY="SANSSERIF"><BR><BR><FONT size=2>pERCEPTOR:<BR><BR>Perceptor received the advice that a unknow bot was in Pred's territory he opened his com link and said "I dentify yourself, intruder, or by Unicrom himself I'll slag you!!!!"<BR><BR>     SideWays:<BR><BR>     "Who ever you are, I don't know how you got this com link, but take a crack at me and you'll regret it." He transformed with no command word and stood taller then perceptor, the rider split in half one grey the other black, the black formed a tiny robot, while the grey landed on sideways neck forming his horned head. "If you consider yourself my equal you should know you still have alot to learn." He avoided all the shots and lifted his arms his forearms opened and missile pods slid out.
